website_summaries.verdict: A low-fat, low-carb whey isolate protein powder made from grass-fed protein with no artificial sweeteners.
pros: 30 grams of clean protein per serving from whey peptides and whey isolate
Mixes quickly and completely without clumping
cons: Expensive for the amount that you get

customer_reviews.title: Great fat burning protein!
customer_reviews.text: DJET77'S MUSCLETECH NITRO-TECH RIPPED PRODUCT REVIEW RATING:10/10 I wanted to try this product because I am constantly on the mission of building muscle while losing body fat. I have to say, I am impressed with the results that I've achieved so far! By using this product, along with a clean diet, I am now at the lowest body fat that I have been at in many years. This product is a great way to kick start the fat burning process and keep it going throughout the day and night! The way that they put these fat burning ingredients together is genius! And the taste is good too!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Great protein with an added boost
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protein powder. Mixes perfect with no clumping and tastes good too; I just use water and it tastes mild but good. The results are the best part. This stuff gives you a nice boost on top of the protein. Helps for the extra energy needed while running at a calorie deficiency. I'm drinking 3 shakes a day for a nice boost in protein intake. I will definitely continue to buy this. It's nice that Amazon gives you a discount for a recurring shipment. I will be switching to the 4lb. tub and delivery every 45 days, however, as it's a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Deitenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Better than some milkshakes
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of muscle tech products. I lost over 80lbs in the last year, a lot of it was taking supplements from muscle tech. I hadn’t tried ripped until this last week, it tastes amazing. I was turned off from thermogenic-proteins because I tried isoburn. That stuff was disgusting. This one, it tastes like a vanilla milkshake like.. better than a milkshake. It’s so good it’s enjoyable to drink it. I mix mine with mootopia or fairlife milk. Fat free versions. There are no clumps, no mixing issues, it’s great. This is the best tasting protein drink I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.author: influence peddler

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a milkshake!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 40 year old man who doesn’t do heavy lifting just free weights and exercise at home but I remembered taking this as a young man and decided to try it again. It’s definitely pricey but worth it alone just for the taste. Mixes well with no clumps and actually tastes good as long as my water is cold. Only taking it for a week but I’ve seen energy improvement already.
customer_reviews.author: christopher horton

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Vanilla flavor. I am definitely not a fan of the taste. Does not really taste like vanilla, definitely artificially flavored but just can't put my finger on any particular flavor. Has a strong aftertaste. Even adding fruit to it did not make it more palatable, the flavor is overpowering. Which would not be a bad thing if it actually tasted good. By the way - it will cost you $5.99 to return it.
customer_reviews.author: ButterBean6536Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great flavour!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tasting protein powders out there! I still laugh at packaging like such, but all containers are like that though! Such a hugh container, but where's the rest of the powder?!?! Lol! It does curb the appetite and a quick fillup when I cant eat lunch. Follow the instructions on the back!! Drink it 30 mins before a meal. It really works as far as making you feel full. I messed up and drank one after lunch and I was miserable for over an hour. 😑 I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Good protein not sure I see or feel any benefit as far as weight loss properties
customer_reviews.text: Works very well I take a scoop every morning to start my day I work out 5 days a week defiantly keeps me up on my protein. Don’t know that I see or feel a difference on weight loss so that’s why it’s only 4 stars. Would recommend though good product
customer_reviews.author: Adam Richter

customer_reviews.title: This Is It
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. I used to use this regularly a few year's back but had to curb it for financial reasons. I can say that in that time period, I lost muscle and gained weight. Obviously, my eating habits, drinking habits, not working out as often and stress didn't help but I noticed a vast diff between when I was taking this regularly and when I stopped. I'm doing regular home workouts since gyms are closed and back to running since the lockdown began. It also seems to be helping with my bowel movements as I seem to have them more frequently than I did previously, which I'm sure helps with the belly fat I'm dying to be rid of!
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Why use anything else?
customer_reviews.text: I just started this today after I had finished two 4lb containers of Cell Tech then one of Nitro Tech (french vanilla). I am looking to get cut up since both the Cell Tech and Nitro Tech did add size and strength. I am pleased with all MucscleTech products I have used so far and expect success with this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Flavor
customer_reviews.text: First of all - found my new favorite flavor! The Chocolate Fudge Brownie, though not tasting like a brownie - to me - is nonetheless delicious. Secondly, adding the weight loss formula makes this the absolute best for the "cutting season". I have already cut 4 lbs. in just two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great protein, ideal macros
customer_reviews.text: I was a big fan of Gold Standard Whey from Costco foreverrrr. I was looking for something similar without compromising on flavor. It's not as clean but it gets the job done. The scoop size is larger than traditional protein powders and it gives you 30g of protein compared to the 24g in other brands per scoop. I've had this on subscription since last year. Both my husband and I lift weights and are happy with this for post-workout or snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate brownie taste not that thick, perfect flavor... Im a 57 year old Veteran got results in 2 months I lose weight, hsvr muscle definition and growth.. Excellent product, I'm expat living in Colombia, JUST reiceved 2 each 4 pound... ove her in Colombia cost is about $65.00 for a 2 pound Jar... so 4 pounds for $40 + is a great price...
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Headache?
customer_reviews.text: The protein tasted really good but the biggest negative was the headache that came with it. I did some research and it turns out that CLA can have side effects such as headaches. Overall good product but you might be a part of the people that have negative side effects to cla.
customer_reviews.author: Ali H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: Great meal replacement. Good tasting. Important for women no soy- whey based and no caffeine which is important because not a fake stimulant. Tried many- this is the best
customer_reviews.author: Tina Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well no build up smooth drink.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I'm sampling different brands to find out wichi like to stay on and I'll just say this one is up in the top 3 for me
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great but didn't notice any weight loss
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and all but didnt notice any weight loss like advertised . I also found it very difficult to mix it with milk ,it leaves those big chocolate chunks. Other than that , it is an amazing product .
customer_reviews.author: J.G

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is fake
customer_reviews.text: Taste funny i still have the same from GNC and was ok. Not sure if this is fake.
customer_reviews.author: Jherwin Tagle Verango

customer_reviews.title: Meh . . .
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't impressed by the taste but I do feel more energy after taking it. I think it's fair priced for the amount given. I'll just have to update later on results if I can remember to.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!  But why all the empty space in the container??
customer_reviews.text: It does the job – taste great and I like the composition and ability to mix it with other items. The only thing is misleading is the packaging: where almost half of the container is practically empty!! This waste a lot of space for storage in my pantry and I don’t understand why they do that!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase I’ll be back!
customer_reviews.text: I normally stick to muscle milk for making my smoothies but I wanted to try something more geared for fat loss and was surprised that Metabol II from champion nutrition was discontinued 🙁. What I can comment on right now is the taste is good, it does not clump so easy to mix not too thick. The container is impressively huge so this will last me a good while 😃 I’ve only used a few days so I can’t comment yet on weightloss but I see you only need 1 scoop compared to the need for using 2 scoops with muscle milk...
customer_reviews.author: NorthernVirginia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. I am anxious to see how it impacts my muscle mass in 4 weeks but confident it will have a great impact .
customer_reviews.author: Gail P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, this product is amazing. I was not expecting it to taste like the product is described, and I was amazingly surprised. Taste just like French Vanilla Pudding and it goes perfectly with PBFit and NF Greek Yogurt. Add in some ice and frozen fruit, and you have the perfect mid day snack or pre/post workout shakes. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: On The Rox

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a chocolate milkshake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it. He would always tease me about how much better his protein drinks taste than mine lol. He really feels like it helped him shred with consistent 5 days per week of exercise he lost about 5lbs using the tub for one month.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if fake or not.
customer_reviews.text: Ok not sure if this protein is fake or not. According to muscletech all their products have an authenticity label with a QR code and hologram. This one does nt have this authenticity label. Not sure if this is an older product before the addition of the authenticity label.
customer_reviews.author: Pantelis

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, just didn't work as good as other products
customer_reviews.text: My body didn't react to this as well as it does some of other products (Xenadrine, etc.), but it didn't have any negative effects. The only reason for less than 5 stars is how it reacted for me. It might do better for you.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor and effective for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this product. It's unlike your typical protein powder and has a great flavor alongside its objective success (I've lost pounds while using it)! This didn't come without ample workouts + diet modification but I believe this product was a good aid to have with me along my journey.
customer_reviews.author: Share&Care

customer_reviews.title: Great protein shake
customer_reviews.text: A very smooth very tasty chocolate flavor. I use it every morning for my morning protein shake and then again after my workout later on in the day. It's loaded with protein and low on calories I would recommend for those trying to lose weight and gain muscle I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian C

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I got the chocolate fudge flavor, and it tasted delicious. Personally, I like mixing in a blender with a banana and almond milk, and ice. It's like a healthy smoothie that tastes great and will keep you full for hours. Its also great to drink before or after a workout!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Cregan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Mixwes well, tastes pretty good for a protein shake, seems to help boost my energy and makes me feel better, more mentally clear.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Thompson

customer_reviews.title: No recomendable
customer_reviews.text: I would it give a good review but, nope, I jus bought this product for 38$ and I decided to buy two more for my friends and day after I purchased mine the price increases for $10 dollars!! Just in a day!! Totally ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: FALSE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: the product is false does not carry all the guarantee do not buy Amazon should not stop selling false things the security seals are false not like the original

customer_reviews.title: tastes good
customer_reviews.text: i always stay away from chocolate flavor as some taste like dark chocolate and some imitate chocolate and taste horrible. this one tastes exactly like chocolate milk if you ever had it. i can talk about the outcome as it is too early, but i like the flavor and it is like a cheat snack which you would love
customer_reviews.author: kailash

customer_reviews.title: Good weight loss supplement
customer_reviews.text: I got it for a discounted price (Amazon had a coupon for it). All I can say is I've been drinking it for a few months now and with regular cardio and caloric deficit, I was able to lose about 30 pounds! That's exactly what I was expecting, 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and high value meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it claims. Fills you up, high fiber so a lot of evacuation and no jumpy or weird feelings plus great flavor. These shakes are my dinner and dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Value Skr

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein Weight Loss Powder Mix!
customer_reviews.text: This protein mix taste very good and easy to mix. I have only been taking the Protein mix for a week now and it definitely fills me up before dinner and makes me less hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and amazing effects. I've been using this to help me lose weight and in the first month I've lost 20lbs!
customer_reviews.author: Tara/Shaun Larimer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nitro tech for more than 20 years and this new formula is the best to keep in good shape, if they can add a better enzymes to avoid burps would be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: ok, as far a flavor, it lacks big time. Quantity is ok with the size of the scoop being HUGE. But I get that's why is has so much protein in each shake. Would I recommend it, no. Wal-Mart has a version that has a better flavor for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Not sure,
customer_reviews.text: No results after three weeks. I'll keep trying though because I'm darn sick and tired of getting sand kicked in my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t blend well
customer_reviews.text: Not a great taste, but not so bad I’d throw it away, I add tons of PB powder. My girls trashed them. Will go back to my other brand when I’m done with this. It’s very hard to mix with water, even when I make it in the blender.
customer_reviews.author: Akendall

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste (which I normally don’t really care about the taste until I had a really bad tasting powder one time I believe it was optimal nutrition) with this proteins I didn’t feel bloated after taking it and really saw progress in controlling my weight. Perfect for after workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Scoop on bottom everytime.... WTF!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why is the scoop on the bottom? Seriously muscle tech.. One container was opened when i got it.. Scoop on bottom of both. Stupid little things that will cost you a customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd can of this stuff now and love it. Great taste. I mix a scoop with a little water and make a cream for my oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find a actual good tasting protein powder can be hard and expensive, but I can safely say now ” you get what u pay for “ it’s by far the best protein powder I’ve tried. I sneak in a bit more powder then I would normally,and even if I don’t mix it all the way and get those chunks I don’t complain now. Good tasting chunks that’s for sure .👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Scott J Enga

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I dont usually write reviews but this stuff I sand and install hardwood floors all day and when I get off I eat everything in sight not anymore im down 20 lbs just this month because it helps slow my appetite from work the price sucks but it is what it is I mix 1 scoop in 1 cup of milk 1 cup of coconut milk and the rest water in a shaker bottle and it tastes like almond joys
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better flavors for a shake ive had. doesnt taste like vitamins like so many of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson B

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Tastes awful. But the profile is good for the price point. Will try a different flavor next time.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work for me
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle and i am following a diet program together with cardio and exercise plan.
customer_reviews.author: Rosmel Sosa Cabello

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Quantity
customer_reviews.text: If you know what you're looking for in a supplement, this will really make a difference in your recovery time, budget, and put some positive weight on while dropping the weight you want to get rid of. Great product! I use a scoop in the blender with a small amount of milk, some frozen fruit, and ice. Me and my son love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: use it for post swim, gym workouts
customer_reviews.text: doesn't taste too sweet. I usually use 1/2 scoop w/ 8 oz goat milk (high CLAs)...

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly! Obviously I didn’t realize how big 4lbs was! It’s huge!! Not disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Got this product on sale for unbeatable value. Tastes great and gives you a good full feeling. Great to supliment a snack or meal.
customer_reviews.author: Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Creatine Free
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor good build you do t always need creatine this 1 is creatine free 💪🏼💪🏼💪🏼

customer_reviews.title: no weight loss but fair product
customer_reviews.text: protein is good but doesn't aid in weight loss or appetite control i work out 4-5 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still #1
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using Nitro Tech off/on since 2005 and they are still top quality!!
customer_reviews.author: K Yates

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wish I woulda bought 2 when it was the deal of the day. Already losing weight with 2 shakes a day. 1 scoop with 8oz or so of water about 40-60 min before I eat breakfast and lunch. Helping for sure. Got the gf’s parents on it now too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent flavor, great results
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for 2 months while I was on a low calorie diet to help with protein intake. Paired with working out 5 days a week I lost 24 pounds in 90 days
customer_reviews.author: Blake Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor whey protein I've ever had in over 20 years.
customer_reviews.text: Used NitroTech and CellTech at least 15 years ago. Just reordered both. The chocolate fudge brownie NitroTech is creamy and delicious, even mixed with water. It tastes great without milk, and I usually hate whey protein mixed with just water. Nice protein boost, but the flavor alone gets 6/5 stars in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Todd T.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part if the product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but mine was less than half full. I didn’t realize it until I went through it so quickly. I bought it at the store the next time and it has lasted more than twice as long.im upset that I was most likely either given an open product or one not filled correctly. I feel cheated
customer_reviews.author: Eileen McNichols

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I’m on my second container. There is a ton of product and I think it is a good meal replacement option. The flavor is really good, but it can be a little thin unless you blend it with other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. SJP

customer_reviews.title: Great all around product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my girlfriend. It’s now her go to protein. Great flavor and works great

customer_reviews.title: The stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I lost all the weight I gained in the four months with this supplement
customer_reviews.author: CEG2D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good taste and works as instructed. I am buying more.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I add this to fruit and vegetable smoothies. Great vanilla flavor.
customer_reviews.author: R. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good for keto
customer_reviews.text: Like the flavor and the low carbs shakes makes it perfect for keto
customer_reviews.author: Karles

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and easy mix ability
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a sample. Great taste and easy mix ability. This protein did provide an extra boost of energy. I took this product during a mid-morning or mid-afternoon pick-me-up. It didn't fill me up, but gave me the energy boost that I lacked on certain days. I definitely wouldn't take this as a post workout if you workout in PM hours. The energy lasts a few hours with no crashes.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor, best results!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this protein for awhile...it does work and I have seen results from this protein a couple of times. The flavor is amazing and the ingredients are top notch. I just wish there were more servings that’s for the price range.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Protein
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and Delicious great for pre workout in the morning.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for weight loss and muscle gain
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff. Helps with my weight loss and muscle building and recovery. 2 times a day can definitely bring results

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, affordable, works very good
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty, creamy enough, easy to swallow. I'm using it to feed muscles and remove little fat from belly

customer_reviews.title: Works with a balance diet.. 🔥 🔥 🔥
customer_reviews.text: You get a heat,rush, energy after an hour of drinking it but your body adjust after a couple of days

customer_reviews.title: Most delicious protein I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most delicious protein shake ive tried! As far as getting lean I dont know. Did not see much result but I did like taking it right after working out!
customer_reviews.author: Nick G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Weight loss Protein
customer_reviews.text: I love this Protein. Whenever I need go shed some weight and tighten up my look I buy this protein. I use water whenever using this protein. Do cardio and light weights more reps and take this after every workout you will see a crazy difference by the time it’s empty.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Missing scoop but great taste
customer_reviews.text: Ok, first off it tastes really good however, I didn't find a scoop in the container also it doesn't mix easily I had really work with it to get it mix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son's used it for when they workout daily. They like it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Siguenza

customer_reviews.title: The taste is better than 99% of other protein powders out there
customer_reviews.text: I drink this immediately after an intense workout with whole chocolate milk. The taste is better than 99% of other protein powders out there. I also notice that it fills me up so I don't get that insatiable feeling like I need to stuff my face with as much food as possible like I do if I don't drink this. I have also noticed my muscles are more defined and I recover faster. I am by no means a gym rat but I do try to live healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: New favorite protein
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the chocolate brownie and so far this is my new favorite protein with its added contents, great flavor, low carb and sugars, and higher protein amount. The flavor is almost like Bowmar Fitness protein that I also use and love. Not as sweet, but just right.
customer_reviews.author: MAMABEAR

customer_reviews.title: BEST Tasting Protein Powder EVER
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many protein powders over the last 30 years.... you can't imagine. This is one of the best. It's smooth, not chalky. Tastes great and it doesn't cost an arm and a leg. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Patton

customer_reviews.title: Wow, awesome
customer_reviews.text: Always like the products from this company. Flavor is on point, tastes great also.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer

customer_reviews.text: Quickly dissolved, didn’t clump with an actual taste I enjoyed. Quality protein!

customer_reviews.text: I like it. Waiting for next promotion period to purchase again~

Unfortunately, I would have to strongly recommend against purchasing this.

customer_reviews.text: This tastes good, i drink 25 min before my workout and after so far its been good these past few days, for it being protein mix its pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Dmartinez2224

customer_reviews.title: Taste is great
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting whey protein I have had to date too early to tell about results but hopefully everything goes well
customer_reviews.author: Chwek13

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: The taste of the Chocolate Fudge Brownie was great and I highly recommend the product for anyone looking to lose weight without taking pills or making any drastic lifestyle changes. With a lean diet and and a three to four day workout regime I was able to lose 10 pounds in a little over two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works trust me I've used them all could taste better but I've seen the results good product great price
customer_reviews.text: Works trust me I've used them all could taste better but I've seen the results good product great price
customer_reviews.author: Juan Cruz

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavor!
customer_reviews.text: From the very few proteins, I have tried this has the best flavor; I drink it once or twice a day and it can replace a normal meal making you feel full for several hours. Which they had even bigger sizes for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda S

customer_reviews.title: Decent stuff, fine mix, tastes better then most,
customer_reviews.text: Really finely granulated powder. Tastes pretty good and has a protein taste slightly. Could use more flavor and additives.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Paul Belomy

product_meta.title: MuscleTech Nitro Tech Ripped Ultra Clean Whey Protein Isolate Powder + Weight Loss Formula, Low Sugar, Low Carb, Chocolate Fudge Brownie, 64 Ounce
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chocolate Fudge Brownie| Size:4 Pound (Pack of 1)Unlike other regular whey protein and whey protein isolate products, every scoop of NitroTech Ripped delivers a scientifically studied dose of its key weight loss ingredient, C. canephora robusta, that is backed by two human studies for results you can trust NitroTech Ripped provides a 30 gram blend of whey peptides and whey isolate for high levels of essential branched chain amino acids (BCAAs). And each two-scoop serving of this incredible, new whey protein formula also delivers CLA, MCTs, L-carnitine L-tartrate, green tea extract, rose hip extract and kelp powder– plus C. canephora robusta. SCIENTIFICALLY SUPERIOR – 5g of glutamine & precursor, 6.8g of BCAA aminos plus a clinically studied 3g dose of HPLC-Tested creatine monohydrate in each serving COLD-FILTERED MICRONIZATION - Cold filtered, multi-phase filtration reduces fat, lactose and impurities without using heat, harsh acids or salt SCIENTIFICALLY TESTED WEIGHT LOSS - Features the key ingredient C. canephora robusta, which has been shown in two double-blind, placebo-controlled studies to help subjects lose weight
feature_bullets: 30 gram Of whey protein per serving - 30 gram of Pure Whey Protein, sourced primarily from whey peptides and whey isolate – two of the cleanest and purest protein sources available
Scientifically tested weight loss - Features the key ingredient,green coffee bean extract, which has been shown in two double-blind, placebo-controlled studies to help subjects lose weight.

Build more strength than with regular whey protein - Contains a research-proven 3 gram dose of Creatine Monohydrate, which – combined with whey protein – helps to build more strength than regular whey protein.
Better Macronutrient profile - Doesn't pack the extra sugar and carbs you'll see in other protein powders with only 4 gram of carbs, depending on the flavor, and no more than 2.5 gram of fat

Cold Microfiltration process to remove more fat, carbs & lactose - Unlike the other guys, we don’t use heat, harsh acids or salt our whey protein has been filtered using multi-phase filtration technology for less fat, lactose and impurities than cheaper protein sources.
